title: Slot´s flying Premier League start unprecedented, claims Wright-Phillips
description: Shaun Wright-Phillips has been blown away by Arne Slot’s remarkable start as Liverpool head coach. Slot took over ahead of the season following Jurgen Klopp’s departure. Having enjoyed success at Feyenoord, Slot has hit the ground running at Anfield. He has lost just one game so far, with Liverpool leading the Premier League by nine […] The post Slot´s flying Premier League start unprecedented, claims Wright-Phillips appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Roma 0-2 Atalanta: De Roon and Zaniolo make it eight Serie A wins in a row
description: Nicolo Zaniolo scored against his former side as Atalanta defeated Roma 2-0 at Stadio Olimpico on Monday to make it eight Serie A wins in a row and move within one point of leaders Napoli. Marten de Roon opened the scoring in the 69th minute with a shot from the edge of the box that […] The post Roma 0-2 Atalanta: De Roon and Zaniolo make it eight Serie A wins in a row appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews
